title: I can't spectate ANY of my friends games

replies.body:
Spectate is not built into the *Beta Client* just yet, but it will be added at a later time. You can access spectate by launching into the *Legacy Client*, which you can access from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions!
im on my legacy client, still cant spectate games :/

My Legacy Client button is missing from my loading screen. However, After I restarted the client (back from logiging in), I was allowed to spectate. I assume there is some chance of that happening, perhaps this post is too old and the client has been updated. Anyway,now it works... sort of...
still in beta? I cannot spetate my EUW games

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TAsRAUix,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-30T03:55:27.496+0000)
>
> Spectate is not built into the *Beta Client* just yet, but it will be added at a later time. You can access spectate by launching into the *Legacy Client*, which you can access from the login screen:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks, now I can spectate {{champion:99}}
Why aren't bot games available? I've been trying to increase my skills on new champions on bots but it won't let me add bots.

I'd imagine because it was prioritized to be added later on in the Beta Client's updates. I can't provide an ETA on when full custom-match functionality may be added in, but let me know if you have any other questions.

How can I spectate a game that my friend is currently playing?
NOTE: he's playing ranked
